gems.name: Opal
gems.info: Opal is a semi-transparent, iridescent gem associated with Libra and is the birthstone for October. It is said to represent healing, joy, and purification.

gems.name: Moonstone
gems.info: Moonstone is named for its pearly appearance that resembles the moon. It is known for being the Traveler's Stone, said to protect those traveling at night.

gems.name: Lapis Lazuli
gems.info: Lapis Lazuli is known for an intense blue color and was popular in ancient Egypt. It represents wisdom, clarity, and intuition.

gems.name: Amethyst
gems.info: Amethyst is a purple stone associated with Aquarius. It is the birthstone for February. It was used by Greeks and Romans to keep themselves sober.

gems.name: Kyanite
gems.info: Kyanite is most commonly found in blue, but can be found in other colors as well. It is said to cause lucid dreams and aid communication.
